name: Home Sick - GGJ2019
description:
In the GGJ19 my team and I decided to do something completely different. With a team of 5 we decided to go for a first person shooter with a crazy artstyle.

Get through this crazy  psychedelic dream by using your best friend, your cat, as a weapon. Shoot the enemies and upgrade your cat by picking up canned food.

p.s - Sorry, we didn't have time for an ending nor a quit button.
